headline: Show HN: Recent Colors for Google Doc – The extension you needed all along
description:
Don't remember if you picked the 2nd or the 3rd yellow color from the bottom? Worries no more.

Open source Chrome Extension that remembers your recently picked colors. All data is local and there is no data collection scripts packaged. All forms of contributions are welcome at https://github.com/DrakeW/recent-colors-for-google-doc
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 谷歌文档的最新颜色 - 你一直需要的扩展
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 谷歌文檔的最新顏色 - 你一直需要的擴展
